title: Student Performance Prediction using CatBoost
features: Designed and implemented an end‑to‑end CatBoost pipeline that predicts student performance with high accuracy, integrating data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model training.
Conducted in‑depth exploratory data analysis with pandas, seaborn, and matplotlib, uncovering key predictors and engineering features that significantly improved model performance.
Built a Flask‑based REST API to serve predictions, containerized the application for scalable deployment, and monitored model metrics with TensorBoard for robust production readiness.
